description:
The Direto XR-T merges Elite’s Direto line with their Drivo line, making more power and more climbing, more affordable. When it's time to take your winter training to the next level (and cut down on worn trainer tires), direct drive trainers are the way to go. Control it with apps and software via ANT+ FE-C and Bluetooth smart to reproduce the steepness of the course you're riding. With a maximum incline of 24%, you'll be able to ride the equivalent of Scanuppia (if your legs allow it). If you're a green jersey type, the Direto XR provides up to 2300W of resistance at 40km/h for tough, out of the saddle sprints. If you're going to put the effort in to follow a power-based training program, this one has a power accuracy of 1.5%, comparable to most stand-alone power meters.

  • Direct drive trainer ensures that every watt you generate is accounted for
  • Very quiet, the only noises you hear will be the chain and shifting gears
  • Optical Torque Sensor (OTS) provides precise power measurement within +/- 1.5%. Integrated power meter delivers the data accuracy
  • Maximum brake power of 2300W at 40km/h
  • 5.1kg (11.22lb) flywheel offers very smooth outdoor-like feel
  • Compatible cassettes: Shimano and SRAM 9/10/11 speed, Campagnolo 9/10/11/12 speed, SRAM NX 12 speed and Shimano micro Spline 12 speed. These cassettes are sold separately
  • Wide, stable base can be folded for transport and storage. Legs automatically lock in place when unfolded
  • Freehub body is required and available separately for Campagnolo, SRAM XD and XD-R and Shimano 12-speed micro Spline
  • Suitable for 130 to 135mm hubs with 5mm diameter quick release axles and up to 142x12mm thru axle hubs
  • Adapters available separately for axles: 148x12mm (Boost), 135x10mm and 135x12mm
  • Front wheel block included
  • Realistic slope simulation of up to 24%
  • Sensorless technology gathers data without extras on your bike, keeping your bike clean
  • 3 LED lights provides feedback on what is connected
  • FE-C and Bluetooth smart control takes care of resistance adjustments
  • Speed, cadence and power can broadcast via ANT+ and Bluetooth smart to your bike computer or phone
  • Choose a course or a training program via the included Elite RealSoftware or My E-training app and resistance adjusts automatically
  • Compatible with interactive apps like Zwift (30-day trial included), Trainer Road, Kinomap, PerfPro, Veloreality and Virtual Training
  • Can use 120-240V power outlet for optimal compatibility when travelling
  • Includes axle spacers, power adapter and documentation
  • Folded dimensions: 30 x 55 x 65cm
  • Footprint: 65 x 84cm (25.6 x 34in.)
name: Elite Direto XR-T Trainer
